name: Amateur Lacrosse Training
description:
Amateur Lacrosse Training is a local multiplayer sports game for 2 players. It was designed as part of a week-long game jam to create a game based on a name generated by The Video Game Name Generator at https://videogamena.me/. Challenge a friend to a 1v1 showdown in this wacky physics-based game that vaguely resembles lacrosse, made by two people who have never played lacrosse before.

Songs used:

  • Accidental Skwugg - RoccoW
  • Epic - Bensound
  • John Cena Theme MLG Airhorn Remix - Cyranek
